attributes.action: call a public enquiry into the pollution of the Brofiscin quarry in the village of Groesfaen, South Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to ‘The Ecologist’ magazine, this quarry is very heavily polluted and no efforts have been made to clean it up or to bring those responsible to account for the pollution. The Environment Agency apparently disputes that there has been a lack of action on its part. This petition therefore calls for a full enquiry into the matter.
